Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config

Interface URIConfigurationFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigurationFactory, DefaultConfigurationFactory, JsonConfigurationFactory, XmlConfigurationFactory
public interface URIConfigurationFactory
Creates configuration from an URI.

  • Method Details

    • getDefaultPrefix

      String getDefaultPrefix()
      The prefix to use for automatic discovery of configuration files.

    • getTestPrefix

      String getTestPrefix()
      The prefix to use for automatic discovery of test configuration files.

    • getSupportedExtensions

      String[] getSupportedExtensions()
      A list of supported file extensions.

      Can contain *, if an attempt should be made to parse files with any file extension.

    • getVersion

      String getVersion()
      The version of the configuration format.

      Should return "2" for the Log4j 2.x configuration format.

    • getConfiguration

      @Nullable Configuration getConfiguration(LoggerContext loggerContext, ConfigurationSource source)
      Parameters:
      loggerContext - The logger context to associate with the configuration.
      source - The source of the configuration.
      Returns:
      A Configuration or null.

    • getConfiguration

      @Nullable Configuration getConfiguration(LoggerContext loggerContext, String name, @Nullable URI configLocation)
      Parameters:
      loggerContext - The logger context to associate with the configuration.
      name - The name of the logger context.
      configLocation - The configuration location or null
      Returns:
      A Configuration or null.

    • getConfiguration

      @Nullable Configuration getConfiguration(LoggerContext loggerContext, String name, @Nullable URI configLocation, ClassLoader loader)
      Parameters:
      loggerContext - The logger context to associate with the configuration.
      name - The name of the logger context.
      configLocation - The configuration location or null
      loader - The classloader to use to load resources.
      Returns:
      A Configuration or null.
